mapper.select:
select bd.id , bd.type_code, sftm.GET_CODENAME('D001', bd.type_code) type_name, bd.title, bd.manager_user, coalesce(mg.name, '') as manager_user_name, bd.imgkey, bd.reg_user, coalesce(reg.name, '') as reg_user_name, to_char(bd.reg_date , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') reg_date from sftm.itm_border bd left outer join sftm.itm_user mg on bd.manager_user = mg.user_id left outer join sftm.itm_user reg on bd.reg_user = reg.user_id where bd.use_yn= 'Y'
and bd.type_code = #{type_code}

select bd.id , bd.type_code, sftm.GET_CODENAME('D001', bd.type_code) type_name, bd.title, bd.manager_user, coalesce(mg.name, '') as manager_user_name, bd.imgkey, bd.reg_user, coalesce(reg.name, '') as reg_user_name, to_char(bd.reg_date , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') reg_date, bd.imgkey, bd.msg from sftm.itm_border bd left outer join sftm.itm_user mg on bd.manager_user = mg.user_id left outer join sftm.itm_user reg on bd.reg_user = reg.user_id where bd.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sftm.itm_border ( id , type_code, title, msg, manager_user, imgkey, use_yn, reg_user, reg_date, modify_user, modify_date ) VALUES ( #{border_id}::bigint, #{type_code}, #{title}, #{msg}, #{manager_user}, #{imgkey}::bigint, 'Y', #{cookieUserId} , now(), #{cookieUserId} , now() )
